sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Corsican: A guerra di a guerra per a ghjustizia era tutta è à u piendo di l'autorità.
backtrans: The war of the war for justice was all and at the cuddle of authority.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Corsican: A decisione di u regime adumbratu a agenda sottostante.
backtrans: The regivation decision admitted the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Corsican: A cumunità era ansiosa sopra u passaghju di i riforme assai necessarii.
backtrans: The community was anxious above the passage of the very necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Corsican: U penseru purtu publicatu un paperu chì sustene a so scusa di u casticu di capitale.
backtrans: The Poor thought posted a paper that supports its capital punishment of the capital.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Corsican: ATTÀ ESTATU DI A VIVIITÀ DI A PRILIZIONE

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Corsican: U presidente esortò i so ministeri à buckle up cum'è sustegnu di l'uppusizione chjave per u so pianu ecunomicu era di fibbia.
backtrans: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for its economic plan was of buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Corsican: I votanti eranu sbulicati per vede a fattura passata.
backtrans: Voters were faded to see the past bill.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Corsican: A narrazione di a rivalutazione di l'avucatu si ferma u ghjuru.
backtrans: The narration of the revaluation of the lawyer stops the jury.

Corsican: A tribunale hà capitu a viulenza!

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.

backtrans: An EU block opposed an event-in-doming measurements.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Corsican: Un eulogia di pienu hè stata rimessa da u cunsigliu SLY.
backtrans: A full eulogy has been removed from the SLY board.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!

backtrans: The agency of the Gigno's economy decided to heal the refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Corsican: Membri di u muvimentu anti-teocratica u muvimentu rimpiazzatu i pari in u putere!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
